Table.name: SMDNP
Table.sql:
SELECT 'CNT_TYPE' = CASE WHEN (SMSM.CNT20 > 0) THEN '20GP*' + convert(varchar(10), SMSM.CNT20) + ' ' ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN (SMSM.CNT40 > 0) THEN '40GP*' + convert(varchar(10), SMSM.CNT40) + ' ' ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN (SMSM.CNT40HQ > 0) THEN '40HQ*' + convert(varchar(10), SMSM.CNT40HQ) + ' ' ELSE '' END, '_CNT_TYPE' = CASE WHEN (SMSM.PCNT20 > 0) THEN '20GP*' + convert(varchar(10), SMSM.PCNT20) + ' ' ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN (SMSM.PCNT40 > 0) THEN '40GP*' + convert(varchar(10), SMSM.PCNT40) + ' ' ELSE '' END + CASE WHEN (SMSM.PCNT40HQ > 0) THEN '40HQ*' + convert(varchar(10), SMSM.PCNT40HQ) + ' ' ELSE '' END, ISNULL((SELECT TOP(1) PARTY_NO FROM dbo.SMSMPT WHERE (PARTY_TYPE = 'FS') AND (SHIPMENT_ID = SMSM.SHIPMENT_ID)), SMSM.CARRIER) AS CARRIER,
ISNULL((SELECT TOP(1) PARTY_NAME FROM dbo.SMSMPT WHERE (PARTY_TYPE = 'FS') AND (SHIPMENT_ID = SMSM.SHIPMENT_ID)), SMSM.CARRIER_NM) AS CARRIER_NM, (SELECT TOP(1) PARTY_NO FROM dbo.SMSMPT WHERE (PARTY_TYPE = 'CR') AND (SHIPMENT_ID = SMSM.SHIPMENT_ID)) AS TRUCKER,
(SELECT TOP(1) PARTY_NAME FROM dbo.SMSMPT WHERE (PARTY_TYPE = 'CR') AND (SHIPMENT_ID = SMSM.SHIPMENT_ID)) AS TRUCKER_NM, SMDN.DN_RMARK, SMDNP.IPART_NO, SMDNP.QTY, SMDNP.OPART_NO, SMDN.DN_NO, SMDN.CARGO_TYPE, SMDNP.SLOC, SMDN.SPEC_PROCID, SMDN.SPEC_DESCP, SMDN.COMBINE_INFO, SMDN.CREATE_BY, SMDN.SC_CODE, SMDN.SC_DESCP, SMDN.SHIP_MARK, SMSM.CUT_PORT_DATE, (SELECT ISNULL(CASE_NO, '') + ' @' + ISNULL(STR(QTY), '') + ' @' + ISNULL(STR(TTL_QTY), '') + ' @' + ISNULL(IPART_NO, '') + ' @' + ISNULL(GOODS_DESCP, '') + ' @' + ISNULL(SMDN.PKG_UNIT_DESC, '') + '\r\n' FROM SMINP WHERE SMINP.U_FID IN (SELECT U_ID FROM SMINM WHERE SMINM.DN_NO = SMDN.DN_NO) ORDER BY SMINP.SEQ_NO FOR XML PATH('')) AS PACK_LIST, SMDNP.PO_NO, SMDN.PLANT from SMDN LEFT JOIN SMDNP ON SMDN.DN_NO = SMDNP.DN_NO LEFT JOIN SMSM ON SMDN.SHIPMENT_ID = SMSM.SHIPMENT_ID WHERE SMSM.SHIPMENT_ID =':=uid'

Table.name: SMINP
Table.sql: SELECT ISNULL(CASE_NO,'') AS CASE_NO,ISNULL(STR(CASE_NUM),'0') AS CASE_NUM,ISNULL(IPART_NO,'') AS IPART_NO,ISNULL(STR(QTY),'0') AS QTY,ISNULL(GOODS_DESCP,'') AS GOODS_DESCP FROM SMINP WHERE SMINP.DN_NO=':=dnno'
